main event: On April 7, 1952, two civilians spotted a brightly glowing object in the sky that faded away rapidly after about five minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object was reported to be white hot or brightly glowing,The object appeared larger than a big plane and had a rectangular shape,The object left a trail behind it,The sky was clear with no other visible objects,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes before the object disappeared.
sighted object: a brightly glowing rectangular object in the sky
